reviews.review_text:
Purchased GoDaddy Smartline service for my business line. It worked fine for about four months then just stopped ringing and would not let callers leave a message. I called the GoDaddy Tech. Department thinking this would be no bi...Read More                                    
                                g deal for them to fix. I was wrong. After spending hours on the phone with them, they simple state they are unable to solve the issue. I'm using an Apple I Phone 6, not like there isn't millions of them in use. They blamed Apple for doing an update and their software doesn't link. Final resolution: they don't fix the issue and DON'T refund your unused subscription fee for the service that they can't fix. I would give them no stars but that option isn't available.Less

reviews.review_title: Worst support imaginable / Bait and Switch Artists
reviews.review_text:
They could improve their support by 100% by just having a 24/7 Chat facility like SiteGround.
To obtain support (as an international client) I had to make expensive international calls ranging from 40 to 130 minutes.
Their suppo...Read More                                    
                                rt staff once you get them are fairly intelligent but arte more focussed on the problem rather than the solution.
It really riled me that every problem I encountered was only solved by spending more money.
What started off as a cheap solution ended up being one of the priciest on the market.

I switched to SiteGround even though I had paid for a full year of GoDaddy.

Best move I ever made.Less

I had webhosting and some domain registrations from godaddy.
Dont need to mention that they deleted my website for no reason, however they are pushing you to buy Domain Privacy.
If you don't do it, expect an extreme spam, many c...Read More                                    
                                alls, emails from website developers etc. This is happening just when you register domain thru Godaddy, that developers confirrmed me many times that godaddy SOLD them all my personal info.
Companies like this should be SHUT DOWN. SCAM, FRAUD, I hate them. never use them!Less

They say they have award winning customer service. But they don't say they won the award for worst customer service. I had problem with cPanel email. And for two weeks I called them countless times but they couldn't solve my probl...Read More                                    
                                em. Moreover they were pursuing me to buy their premium email service. Purchased their hosting for 3 years but after having such service I couldn't stay with them for more than two months.Less

With over 100 domains hosted here, they continue to get worse since Parsons left. Constantly changing your platform, and upselling on every page when trying to renew. Keep looking for better alternative...
I was a loyal client for years and they used to be awesome. Today I recommend to everyone they stay away. Their tech was bad and the support was worse.
Looks like a scam. After i registered on the domain buy service, I started getting mails from domain trading companies.They sell your data to other vendors and probably make a ton of money

One of our websites went down due to an error on their part with the restore function in Cpanel. Rather than fix our issue and restore our website, Godaddy wanted to charge $149 to restore the website. Despite stating a misconfigu...Read More

reviews.review_title: DO NOT TRUST GODADDY!  GO SOMEWHERE ELSE
reviews.review_text:
GoDaddy will steer you into buying multiple years of Service and lure you with good pricing. Then they will get you to Auto-renew so there's nothing else to think about. If you ever forgot you were on auto-renewal and happen to mi...Read More                                    
                                ss their email receipt, even if you're late in cancelling for just 13 days, they will NOT REFUND YOU! They will keep your money for the 5 years that you prepaid, even if you're never going to use their service. That's how they make money, but PREYING on the LITTLE PEOPLE. LOOK SOMEWHERE ELSE. TOGETHER, WE CAN BRING GODADDY DOWN. Danica Patrick, is this the kind of company you want to associate yourself with? Maybe you better think again. They are unscrupulous and dishonest and just out to make an easy buck with no consideration for the consumers. Their refund policies are embedded in all the legalese.Less

reviews.review_title: Godaddy BAD COMPANY CULTURE TO SUCK MONEY FROM YOU. WHY?
reviews.review_text:
It wasn't user friendly from the start so I stopped using it after 2 months. it was too frustrating. And what happened after one year was, they auto renewed it for me. And had me going around in circles, and after that, tell me th...Read More                                    
                                at it was past the 30days refund policy, and they couldn't refund it anymore, when I didn't even want the website anymore after 2 months. Now you know why their profits keep growing? When more people use, and after they have stopped, and Godaddy just helps them auto-renew without consent, they treat silence as consent, but sometimes people miss the email. How can they make the default decision? Yes, go daddy might be good for some people, but the way they work to grab more profits just reflects badly on the company culture and it makes me very disappointed. I have learnt to be more stringent with all these approvals. Thank you godaddy, for teaching me this lesson. Well, I go to college and i pay for it, I come here and I also pay for it. But you can be sure that, I wouldn't pay for it again, and I'll make sure none of my friends will be part of your quarterly profits. Thank you.Less

After a long talk to their automated service and inputting my customer number, I had to even wait for longer time to talk with a rude, tired & impatient customer service representative asking same questions and once more custo...Read More                                    
                                mer number. Amazingly as I am not holding the same credit card I used few years ago and didn't remember my password, he refused to identify me through other personal details.
I would give them 0 star if there was an option available. BTW, The service type below doesn't offer domain option.Less

Purchased the required auction subscription because a domain I wanted was said to be on auction. After I subscribed, the domain won't come up in the auctions search. Now I can't find the option to cancel the subscription and havin...Read More                                    
                                g a terrible time trying to contact their so-called support. Terrible business practices.Less

Their website is terrible. I tried to cancel in December THE DAY MY CREDIT CARD WAS CHARGED and they did not let me cancel. They said I would receive a refund shortly and it was never processed. I called again in January to compla...Read More                                    
                                in. The said only 2/3 of my account was canceled in December. Additionally, they said when I tried to cancel in December my chat wasn't "Finished" so that is why I did not get a refund. So ridiculous that someone would try to cancel and only cancel 2 /3 of the services associated with the account. It makes zero sense. They refunded only 2/3 of the renewal price and said I had to pay the last 1/3. Such a scam. Do NOT use them.Less

I tried to cancel Auto Renew products through their web application but I was unable to. I kept getting an error message. My credit card information was expired so I figured they couldn’t charge me, right? Wrong! They charged me $...Read More                                    
                                500 dollars, and when I disputed the charge they took away all of my products and kept my money. Now they won’t give me a refund. Their company is run by criminals.Less

reviews.review_title: GoDaddy is worst company in the world do not I repeat do not purchase any thing from this retarded company

Their hosting has been fine, but don't let them get you into a discussion about their products. They'll try and sell you everything under the sun - "it's only $1000 per month - you'll be writing your own checks!" - that was a disc...Read More                                    
                                ussion about SEO. For the folks that don't really understand what you are buying, please seek advice and ensure you understand what you are buying and that you really need it before you buy anything.

Incredibly pushy salespeople. I guess their cheap web hosting is their version of a loss leader as they'll talk you into at least a few hundred dollars more of their products if you let them. Then they'll call you every fews weeks with another product they "can't believe you don't already have".

Had to tell them to stop calling and emailing me and had to block their email since they wouldn't stop - basically harrassment.....Less

I've given up already. I'm looking for another hosting and hopefully moved out from this crappy webhost BS COMPANY!!!!Less

reviews.review_title: Worst Hosting Service Ever! Stay away from it

Customer Care Executives do not have any technical knowledge, they always put your call on hold for 15 to 40 minutes.
if you want to resolve the issue, you have to spare atleast 1 hour to 3 hours......it may be possibility that after 3 hours, it wont be resolved..

reviews.review_title: my very terrible horrible customer support experience
reviews.review_text:
I spoke to a customer service person named Chris at 28 Dec 2017 @10.45am. His tone was rude & abrupt, he didnt bother to ask my name only asking for my account no. on top of that the conversation was very one sided and he woul...Read More                                    
                                dnt take the time to listen to my concern, i literally had to talk over him to get him to shut up and listen. Ive had better customer service at MacDonalds served by teenagers. He is a complete let down compared to the 2 other customer service people Ive spoken too

Edit reviewPublishLess

I bought a domain from godaddy.com for my new beissnce. Everything was going fine until godaddy close to lock down the account out of the blue.
now I'm losing 10s of 1000s of dollars a day, had to debt on a lone and my home is be...Read More                                    
                                ing repoassed. my family is now living out of are car and if lucky we can stay at a local homeless shelter both of witch are grate places to raze your kids. I was told by go daddy to upload documents I never had. Even after filing a BBB case and stilling my support reps of the problems they did not care one bit and just laft at me like I was worthless.Less

After being advised to renew my domain hosting, I clicked through an email from GoDaddy. I renewed for three years, but on checking my email inbox I had received another email reminding me to renew, and no receipt, so I went throu...Read More                                    
                                gh and repeated the process. I then receive two receipts! According to the terms and conditions I can apply for a refund within 120 hours, so I call the next day to ask for one to be cancelled, to be informed that this can only be done if Im willing to lose all the existing time I have already paid for, with no refund! Customer service agent was rude and unhelpful, threatening to close my account and lock my domain name to prevent me from being able to use it. Avoid AT ALL COSTS!Less

reviews.review_title: The worst hosting company I ever done business with
reviews.review_text:
Despite the VPN service, their services was S-L-O-W. I have contacted support numerous times. I figured support usually gets a lot of phone calls, so I contacted them via chat. After about 24 minutes (!!!) of wait time, still nobo...Read More                                    
                                dy came online. So I called them on the phone. What a miserable experience! I was disconnected twice. After that it took about 42 minutes until I was connected to a level one (but I would call it level ZERO) support person who had no clue about why the database constantly gets disconnected and give 500 errors. I asked to be transferred to a more knowledgeable person and while I was on hold, the line disconnected AGAIN! I don't need this kind of experience. If you are a small business or even just a person wants a simple hosting, do yourself a favor and get a reputable hosting company.Less

We had a deal about the price...Read More

But after very long and annoying process of transfer I've got not all money...
And now they say we HAVE 20% commission! manager doesn't answering.

We are Highly Recommended LiveMNC

Thank you LiveMNC Data center teamLess

I have my domain with GoDaddy and they have been great in that capacity. I went to them to build my new website and it has been a NIGHTMARE on every level. They are experts at talking and selling, but they don't deliver anything w...Read More                                    
                                hich resembles a professional product....think 12 year olds learning a new software. They have NO design or business sense. They don't return phone calls when they say they will. They are huge, so you'll never get anything from a run around from them. I wanted a simple website...one picture per page, and they haven't been ale to deliver that! It's been months, I paid something like $1,500, and I have NOTHING!!!!!Less

The first thing that I noticed about GoDaddy, was there terrible UI and UX. This is probably what led to me having issues with them over false advertising and not following Canadian Retail law. The support is not helpful, and seems like they just want to waste time. I try to avoid GoDaddy.

I received an email today that due to a "glitch", GoDaddy had to turn my auto-renew back on because it was "inadvertently" turned off. BS! I turned it off INTENTIONALLY! 3 times this year, this company has sneak sold me products. ...Read More                                    
                                "Oh, but you can turn it off at any time." HOW ABOUT NOT SNEAK SELLING ME ITEMS! I should not have to do anything to stop a service that I did not ask for, and did not authorize. This is a horrible company.Less

When signing up for a URL at Godaddy you are given “free features” which are signed up for in the small print. Most people never even use them. Then after a year suddenly it autosubscribes for the service but now at $100 a year. T...Read More                                    
                                he user is never contacted: emails go straight to the junk folder. The language in the emails gets into any spam filter, almost as if they designed it so you wouldn’t ever see it. Another year passes and another auto renewal only now the price has increased to $148. On top of that, charges for “Office Email”, $80, all buried in the small print.

I was quite upset upon seeing these charges in credit card billing and so I immediately followed up with Godaddy. No one would do anything, their policy was to tell customers to just get lost and go elsewhere. Their legal department responds to emails with a form saying they don’t respond to customers and here are the addresses you can sue them at.Less

reviews.review_title: REFUSED refund for 60.86, service never used.
reviews.review_text:
I called to get a refund from GoDaddy for $60.86 they charged me without my permission autorenew, which they applied. i did not.
They refused the refund even though I never used the service. Sneaky, dishonest. I will go to my cre...Read More                                    
                                dit card company and file a complaint.
I have gotten refunds before with auto charging, which companies applied. The agent I spoke with wouldn't even give me the name of Go-Daddy's VP for Customer Service. That is surely illegal. I will win. if we boycott companies with poor customer service, they will improve. FIGHT BACK!Less

I have a BS in Marketing, so I am only so smart. I rely on written direction to correctly accomplish a technical task. GoDaddy had none. Sure, there were lots of story on thigs you could use but no actual direct instructions. Othe...Read More                                    
                                r websites send you all info regarding FTP, username & password, nameserver etc. GoDaddy? Nothing. OK, I'm going to try and press through. I have websites at GoDaddy no problem. OK, I can attach the name, but no way to know their exact nameserver is for the site.
OK, now I have a front page on the reseller site. Can't change a thing. No FTP address to get new files up. This is a problem, right? So, I need to call support for this right? OK, listen to this.
GoDaddy has a support number on their website, a single number. Now when you call that number it may or not be the number you need to talk to. I called the number and they had to send me to the reseller support dept.. OK, that was fine the day before. Yesterday, I called the same number, somebody picked up the phone and hung up. OK, maybe I made a mistake I'll try again. I call the number again and a Chinese sounding guy picks up the phone and says wrongs number. OK I am a fast learner calling this number is not going to get me anywhere. So, I search and find an email address.
I email them and I write as precisely as I can, the problems and issues I have so that at least they would know what to address. I get an email back telling me I should call this number. No attempt to address the issues in the email. OK, this is the way it goes. So, I call the new number and it tells me the voice mail box has not been setup. WTF?
Like I said I am a fast learned and now me and GoDaddy and the Reseller BS are done. Finished. I feel like a dope because I am thinking they are all top notch.
Why this is important, #1 if you enter the URL I attached to the site you get a blank space. Now there is a website, it is up and running, so what's the URL to get to it? Don't ask me I have no idea and I own it.
I went through and jacked up the prices just for fun knowing most people not paying anything like that. Here is the thing, suppose some business buys up on a jacked-up price site and accessories, and then it craps out on them, and then they get support like I got. Who is going to get sued? Me, that's who, so I went back and globally reset all the prices, because I have zero control on anything dealing with that reseller site. I paid and have no idea how to administrate or operate it. I've already determined it is a loss, but I'm going to try and get refund, but I have no optimism on that.
So, if my story helps anybody contemplating being an entrepreneur with a GoDaddy reseller site, please, think twice. I wish I had known about this place before I signed up. I had no idea how decrepit this part of GoDaddy’s service was, or I would never have given them my money.
The domain I attacher to this site is my business brand and it isn't working so I do not know the url of the site. I have only seen it from inside the control panel.Less

reviews.review_title: What a joke. Don’t even know affiliated companies

reviews.review_title: Horrible tech support . Incompetent , dishonest , total no follow through
reviews.review_text:
I have had my website hosted with Godaddy for a very long time . Few months ago they informed me that it was hacked and because of that they suspended the email form on my website. They told me that in order to get it restore I ne...Read More                                    
                                ed to pay them $ and complete number of steps . I did all of that the email never got restored . Another phone call to them , another person another $ requested of me . I paid . Still no results . Contacted them again , another person , another opinion another $ requested of me . Still no results .Less

I have a Godaddy account that goes from Sept to Sept. In June 2017, 3 months before my contract would expire, they sent me an email to renew my email account for $53 a year. So I sent off the money, stupid me. A few weeks later th...Read More                                    
                                ey sent me another email that I needed to renew my domain account for $15 a year. I decided to look for a cheaper service which I found at 1and1.com where the total cost for domain is $1 first year and up to 20 email addresses for $12 for the first year and $25 for both in succeeding years, so I signed up. When I went to Godaddy and asked for a refund of my prepayment for Sept 2017 to Sept 2018 they refused saying I requested the refund more than 30 days after I paid it. I feel very scammed by Godaddy. They asked me to renew 3 months early and then refused to refund when I switched to a new service prior to the start of my contract year.Less

reviews.review_title: Very slow performance | Many events of web server down
reviews.review_text:
I was a GoDaddy customer for 5 years. I have a simple web site in which I write technical articles about Office 365 environment.

The support guys are very pleasant and polite but….
The web site performance was very bad, and I ...Read More                                    
                                have experienced many times, events in which my web server was down for minutes and sometimes for an hour or more.

I talk with godaddy support many times, and the only advice that I got is – purchase VPS or dedicated server.

In addition, each time that I my web server was not available; GoDaddy doesn’t send any kind of notification about this event.

I move on to another web hosting provider, and I’m very happy!!!

My web site performance was improved by 30%, and the web server is always up!Less

reviews.review_title: Crooked Company. They are in bed with domains by proxy.
reviews.review_text: If domains expire they pass is on to domains by proxy. Domains by proxy copies the sites content and takes the domain and content. They do not respond to inquiries and when you ask godaddy as to what their affiliation with domains by proxy is they do not respond.

reviews.review_title: The worst company on the internet, I am amazed they are allowed to operate
reviews.review_text:
A terribly unethical company who must have stolen a whole day or longer of my life wasted going back and forth with support due to their misinformation and incompetence.

Everything I try to do with them is a big hassle. For exa...Read More                                    
                                mple, I have had to attempt a domain transfer 4 times because they keep refusing it. They come up with a new excuse each time which they should have told me before providing me with the wrong information.

Like today they gave me the wrong EPP code. Their domain transfer instructions page is incorrect. They list 6 steps and say that's it at the end. It isn't because you then have to go any accept on a hidden page, otherwise they keep your domain. One big scam to keep you with them and keep trying to upsell.

Last year a clients website was offline for days too, we don't even host the site with them, just have the domain there. So they are incompetent as well as being scammers.

Support is useless, they have to pass me around the world to see notes that are only viewable in the country they were made.

They are spammers because of the ridiculous upsells that you are bombarded with. So many of my clients have useless add-ons like silly domain names and paying for email as well as hosting. Someone should sue them, there must be a case to make millions.Less

reviews.review_title: Website Builder and Go Central - WORST for photo heavy websites!!!
reviews.review_text:
I have always liked GoDaddy and have been a customer for many years. HOWEVER, their web building products, Website Builder and Go Central have the absolute WORST photo browsers/apps for maintaining photos on your site that could p...Read More                                    
                                ossibly exist. I have written them many times (never got an answer) and called their tech support many many times and my comments and suggestions seem to fall on deaf ears. If you have a site where you use very few photos and also change them infrequently, this might not be an issue. But if you DO like to have lots of images and switch them out frequently - STAY AWAY from these products!!!

After this last time of trying to take off 20 photos and switch to new ones and it taking me almost an hour to delete the old photos, I have really had ENOUGH. With sites like Facebook allowing you to quickly upload, delete, switch around, move photos into albums and find them quickly - including photos that are actually text (pdfs) and SEE what they say - I do not and will not ever understand a web building service that does not allow these basic functions!! NO albums, so if you have say, 100+ photos, it is impossible to organize them.

Not only that, but to find a photo that has been uploaded, say, to move it to another place on your site or delete it, scrolling down through the Photo Browser keeps popping the browser up to the top - MANY MANY times until you are finally able to scroll down far enough. Once you have scrolled down, then you can only access ONE photo. If you want another from the former photos, you can not choose more than one, so you have to repeat this whole scrolling thing, where the browser brings you back to the top many times, before you can finally access the photo that was maybe next to the one you just selected or moved. No batch selecting.

You also can not view the Browser photos in anything but a very small thumbnail. So if say, you have a number of pdfs with the same general format and that are in text, you are unable to differentiate one from the other. In my case, I have pedigrees of my cats that in thumbnail format all look the same. It is impossible to choose one, based on the text content. So I find myself uploading the same pdf images over and over again - simply because I can not SEE them, they are too small to read.

Then again, you are unable to keep any images in folders, such as certain products or categories (T-shirts, cotton shirts or whatever have you).

Working with images within the Website Builder or Go Central is practically impossible and VERY VERY frustrating!! Even more frustrating is GoDaddy's complete disregard for listening to customers on these issues - and these services are EXPENSIVE!!! I'm sure I am not the only customer who deals with a lot of images on their site!! And if computers themselves can offer easy ways to find files and images and social media like Facebook can offer easy ways to organize, upload and delete files and images - WHY NOT GODADDY??? But they seem to not care and not want to listen.

Well, they are going to lose a long time customer when my contracts are nearing their end this next time - I have three sites with them and I doubt I will renew..Less

Go Daddy hosted web service and their "Synching" Feature is absolutely atrocious and unreliable. They try to sell the 1 button Synching service by suggesting you can work on you "staging" site and then "push" over the finished con...Read More                                    
                                tent to the live site. Problem is, if the process fails (and it always does, i've learned) they blame it on your content and you are left with no options and they are happy to tell you that. Stay away and save your invested time.Less

GoDaddy sells your information so if you use their service to register your domain, you will be bombarded with telemarketers and cold calls soliciting your business. I highly recommend using a more professional site to register domains.

reviews.review_title: Godaddy as a register is terrible
reviews.review_text:
This company is awful. Once you've registered a domain they do everything they can to make it difficult to move your domain. Locked the account. Randomly change passwords and tech support is impossible to reach. As a non-profit we...Read More                                    
                                 need to change contact information annually as volunteers change and Godaddy won't let anyone in the organization change stuff when the original person has died!Less
The first pathetic service no proper tech support and no proper code execution server

reviews.review_title: It's Now a Boiler Room Operation:  Avoid Any Auto Billing
reviews.review_text:
I've had many years of experience with this company. I recently had a billing problem over auto renewal of several domains. They've always been aggressive at marketing and squeezing $$$ from consumers, but it has reached stratosph...Read More                                    
                                eric levels now. Borderline deceptive on email notifications of expirations/renewals, and unresponsive (and cold) customer service whose motto seems to be: the customer be damned, as long as we can squeeze more short-term $$$ from them. No attempt to solve the problem or be helpful. Avoid this company now. Score would be zero if that was allowed.Less
Horrible company, do not buy from them, pure scam. Not even one star, minus star-🤢🤢🤢🤢

reviews.review_title: GoDaddy Web Hosting and Email Service UNRELIABLE
reviews.review_text:
My email service stopped at 2.06 PM when I was out of town. When I got home, I saw an email from Godaddy that due to a payment issue from March stated “services indicated on the order have been either discontinued or suspended.”
...Read More                                    
                                
I was expecting several important email, so I called Godaddy and they said will restore service and “I will not use any emails”. I still did not get my emails the next morning and also the web site hosting was broken and not working after the account suspension. Two days later web hosting still does not work.

I found out later that they DELETED 7 email accounts, and any emails to these accounts were not saved. There could be an issue such as having the old credit card number on record, but they failed to provide any notice and a short reasonable time such as 48 hours or more to fix the issue instead of deleting email and web hosting with only notice after the fact. This is the third time we experienced the same issue of deleting and we will never expose ourselves to such unreliable service in the future.Less

reviews.review_title: Godaddy is bad  in tech support and pricing.
reviews.review_text:
I had it for more than 10 years and never really paid attention to it. In the beginning their service and price were great, but for the last few years it has gotten worse. Just this week transaction was the last straw - selling me...Read More                                    
                                 something I don't need and not willing to credit me the purchase I don't need. I am jumping off from vendor and probably will never go back.Less

reviews.review_title: Worst Company to buy a domain
reviews.review_text:
Godaddy seems to stealing money from common people, They donot Provide any of the Quoted amounts as a demand note in PDF format and neither they talk over this in transparent way. Godaddy Refrains from sharing grievances resolutio...Read More                                    
                                n center details. I am putting this in consumer forum for such a big Fraud company and also sharing below the fraud. i donot have any personal problems or dislikes with Godaddy, but they have played politically in this regard. I request each of my friends and supporters to come together joining hands to fight this. Share this as much as you canLess

reviews.review_title: Very bad hosting support specially on plesk share hosting,
reviews.review_text:
Most of the support staff doesn't even have idea about what they are dealing with, Managers don't get on call and keep asking to wait for around 1 hour. Had to pay for backup with no fault of mine since godaddy screwed it up. And ...Read More                                    
                                that also they took 7days to get me the backup. I since moved out of godaddy and moved total of 7 accounts. Screw you godaddyLess

reviews.review_title: worst customer service ever!! only good when they are selling you..
reviews.review_text: tried cancelling my 2 domains last year only to be received by a list of requirements, scans, documents and then only to say they did not receive it. this year they charged me again when the auto renew boxes were unchecked. scammers! then deny it on their end..

Ridiculous worst customer support ever! They just brush you off with reasons that don't make sense and refuse to refund over an unknown charge! Very very bad experience and Will never ever use Godaddy service again !

reviews.review_title: GoDaddy Don't purchase a long term plan!
reviews.review_text:
I purchased a 3 year plan to save a few dollars. After less than a year, I found out that the Web Site Builder Plan was not very good for my needs and took a LONG time to figure out and set up. I decided to use a different website...Read More                                    
                                 company after 10 1/2 months of purchasing (it took a month to get it set up properly) I requested a prorated refund for the 2 years+ that I wasn't going to use. They said that it is in their refund policy that to get a refund of any of your purchase, you have to request it within 30 days of purchase. NOT a good way to do business. That says to me "We know our service sux, so we won't give you a chance to get your money back". I don't do business that way and will make sure never to recommend them or use them.Less

Contacted by GoDaddy for someone who wanted to buy my domain. Their site was difficult to navigate. The only way to find the page handling the sale was to go back and click the link from the email. They then held my payment for ov...Read More                                    
                                er a week beyond the 5-day release hold. They had me fill out payer information, then said my account had no profile. They asked for information one piece at a time. Filled out one page and then I needed to fill out something else. They couldn't tell me everything they needed all at once. I do not recommend.Less
I missed my domain payment. They did not let it go, but kept for they own, now offering me to buy it back 10 times more expensive than it initially was. Greedy bastards.

I wanted to cancel my subscriptions on-line through my manage my account page. I even followed the link to the unsubscribe option that GoDaddy sent me in an email and wasn't able to. I was not able to do this through my account pa...Read More                                    
                                ge so I thought I would just remove my billing info. It is not possible to remove your billing info unless you add another cc number. So they have my CC info against my will and will not let me remove it and are making it difficult to cancel my subscriptions.Less

Overall, GoDaddy is ok. But, they totally ripped me off. I had an issue with my web site that they host. When I called them about it, they just kept saying that there was malware on my site. They assured me that this was my issue ...Read More                                    
                                despite my skepticism. So I spend $200 on the malware scanning program. It takes 5 seconds. Guess what? Same problem. When I complained that I still had the problem, they just kept saying that I was not better off because there was no malware. The whole thing was a scam.Less

As I write this, I have been trying to activate my office 365 domain email account at Godaddy. It's had this message for the past three days saying "We’re creating your email account. This should take just a few minutes. We’ll ema...Read More                                    
                                il you when it’s ready just wait a few minutes, your account will be activated." Yet up till now no account no activation. the Live chat service is always OFF yet they call themselves award winning. And for F*** sakes!! no email support. They expect you to only reach them by phone. Expecting you to make international calls to them at your expense. They have a few countries listed up with country help numbers, if your country is not listed, then you must make international calls to them and wait in loop to get served. Not even email support!!!! this is the most terrible customer service approach I have ever seen. Run far from godaddy if u can. Else you would live to regret it.Less

LiveMNC is great hosting company
Reason:
1. Payment Mode : LiveMNC has many modes of payments.
2. support : LiveMNC offers awesome support if you mess up with your website

they will resolve your issue in No time.
3. Uptime ...Read More                                    
                                : When it comes to Uptime I rank LiveMNC 6/10 because In most

cases server will be down for a Min(Not every time)
4. Price : You can buy a domain and many other products at a cheap price and

you can apply many coupons.
5.Server response : Server response is bit slow when it is compared to other

hosting services like Hostgator
Overall LiveMNC best hosting servicesLess
Go daddy bomb you with spam and calls to your phone. They auto renew products when you specifically ask them not to, they have taken $46.68 from my account and refuse to refund it hence this review.

What the heck did they do with the old web page editor!? Holy cr** the new "user friendly" web page design is awful! virtually no ability to truly customize your web page. Stay away. I AM SO disappointed.

GoDaddy is #1 web hosting company in world, I am from India and hosted my 2 website with GoDaddy. I am so happy to it's cheap hosting price plan and support services, its support services is much better than any others in India.

I've been their customer for some years, and I was satisfied their support in English. But the other day I called Japanese support center and I had a terrible experience. I wanted to transfer my website from another server and I n...Read More                                    
                                eeded help about FTP server, etc. First thing he said was "did you buy a product without knowing how you use it?" and he didn't even ask my customer number/name. I tried to explain that I wanted to know, but he repeated saying "if you want to know about FTP, that's not our job". Finally I could know where I can find the site IP, he laughed! He said, "funny, your mistake was such a simple thing".Funny!?? As he was so rude, I asked his full name and to connect to his supervisor. But He said he doen't have them! I'll
call them tomorrow if I can make a claim about him. I hope they can fire this person.Less

We tried to build our own Word Press site through GoDaddy interface. Should be simple, we are bright educated people. Started calling with technical and web interface problems. They fix technical, although new problems cropped up....Read More                                    
                                 Always said regarding web, we don't know how to design on Word Press, not what we do. Keep trying to solve problem, call them to figure out work arounds, no help. Finally, fed up after friend who is computer programmer states he can only fix Word Press so far in code. Try another theme, still problems. Call billing for refund, but by now fell out of 30 days by 5 days. No refund from billing, so I asked to speak to Supervisor in Billing and I got Chris. Chris says no refund and starts asking me why I didn't do this, do that all these ideas of what I should have tried. Of course, technical support offered none of these ideas when I was within the 30 days and calling about the problems. Chris states while they do have situations where they give refunds outside of 30 days he will not give it here because that would be like trying to return a car because you don't know how to drive. So rude, condescending and unacceptable. I told him in good faith we had called and called and tech support offered nothing as to work arounds or even other ways to work that could have helped us. I stated again and again that the service did not work, the layout was faulty and it was not a straightforward user error in our case. After placing me on hold for 45 minutes because I felt they were being unfair as we were very close to the 30 days and they had a record that we had been calling in beforehand about the problem (he did check in a few times to see if I had anything new to add) he ended up hanging up on me. Still feel they should refund here even though I was hung up on.Less

I've had a VPS with them for a while now, yet after the first few months things slowly went downhill. Their support is very limited and they've become less and less reliable. Not a good company to use a VPS with if you're a business owner.

I have been with Godaddy for last three years. First two years I hosted one website. They allocated 512MB RAM for that account which was somewhat OK for my mid traffic portfolio website. But developers cannot work on the staged su...Read More                                    
                                bdomain because sometimes the IO processes exceeds and the other time "the server closed the connection" error. I talked with their support team and they said to upgrade the resources level to get more power. I said, fine, let's see.

Now after two years I upgraded my hosting plan to delux and still get the same 512 RAM which is not even enough for 100 - 200 visitors per day. I kind of debated with them for what's the logic in up-gradation if I get the same resource level. But the executive (girl) was quite dumb and could not justify and ended up saying that they have the same resource level setup for all the plans. Frankly speaking they charge almost the same amount as the hosting fee (one year) for resource level up-gradation which is not logical and feasible. The only benefit they show case is the number of emails they provide with each plans. Not every body require 500 emails, I mean what am I supposed to do with 500 and 1000 emails if I do not get bandwidth / physical memory upgraded with the respective plans.

The most vague thing is they never talk about resources prior to sales. Huh! I will certainly move to other good hosts out there where I get value for money.Less

Please beware. Don’t register your website here. They sell your number to website builders and then you get back to back calls throughout the day from call centres. When I called godaddy support, they asked me to purchase Rs.130 p...Read More                                    
                                rivacy settings! So now I have to buy my privacy settings so that my phone is not flooded with useless offers? What the hell? They should have warned me earlier that they are going to sell my number to companies and earn business out of my number and from me as well to buy privacy settings.Less

reviews.review_title: Hosting My Website on Godaddy?, No Way!
reviews.review_text:
I have used their hosting plan for almost one year in starting. I have purchased Deluxe plan with unlimited website but seriously they only provide 512 MB RAM which will consume in only 2-3 small website with 100-200 visitors per ...Read More                                    
                                day. And the funny thing is they have never mentioned that you will get only 512 MB RAM. If you complain them they will ask you to pay more for another 512 MB RAM.
I think godaddy is made for domain registration not for hosting.
Yes their Managed Wordpress hosting is very good if your sites are built with wp cms.
So from my side. Godaddy? Big No!Less

Godaddy is good for buying domain.They are very reliable and are inexpensive

They're cheap, and they give discounts many a times, but they only apply to NEW customers . No renewal coupons which is a disadvantage for existing cu...Read More                                    
                                stomers.

I have not yet used their hosting services.

Overall, they are ok and I would recommend them for people looking for simple domains at a reasonable price.Less

reviews.review_title: Stay away or kiss your $$ good-bye
reviews.review_text:
There's nothing worse than a company that refuses to return your money when they can't deliver what they promise. It's bad enough that their assurance that a particular domain configuration was possible on their system turned out ...Read More                                    
                                to be untrue. It's bad, but hey, it happens sometimes.

But then to refuse to return the customer's money? No excuse. it left a large credit sitting in my account that I am supposed to use up somehow.

Worse than that, when I tried to transfer that customer credit to another account, they refused outright. The reason? Simple: "We can't." I see. And why is that? "Because we can't." Yes, I heard that the first time. What's the reason you can't? "We can't do that. I don't know how to say it any clearer, Sir. We just can't." Yes, I've heard you say that 3 times already, but I haven't yet heard a reason why. "There's no way to do that on our system."

Got it, folks? To steal a phrase from an old TV show, apparently when you try to do something at GoDaddy, Computer Say "No." You might as well kiss your money goodbye...Less

I was a Godaddy customer for almost 10 years, and although I wasn't especially happy with them I stayed, mostly because they were okay and I was comfortable enough with that. However, during the last year they've become TERRIBLE! ...Read More                                    
                                My sites have gone down often, 2 or more times a day often. Usually 3- 5 minutes at a time. The final blow however, was the day one of my sites went down more than a dozen times for a total of almost 90 minutes, while another went down more than six times for more than twenty minutes... There were times I couldn't logon to my own sites and times they would go down while I was working on them. Godaddy was the best when I started. They are now about the worst.Less

reviews.review_title: I will not do business with them any more
reviews.review_text:
After I realized my website is not working without any notice from Godaddy , I called them to find out what was the issue they put me on hold for about 20 minutes , and just because I couldn't remember my C. card number that I pai...Read More                                    
                                d for the crevice over three years ago lost my website now Although I have all proof that I am who owns the domain name .Less

All my blogs and sites domains are hosted with GoDaddy windows economy shared hosting. Till now i have not faced any big issues. 99% Uptime guarantee, 24/7 customer service available and great technical support.

They auto-renewed after I asked not to, then would not refund it because nobody could access the account. Strangely, a few days after the 30 day limit they were able to access the account but told me it was too late.
Ripped off...

I'm using Godady to host more than 5 sites on my VPS Linux hosting. It's performing very well without slowing down any of the sites. In fact, I'm getting over 10k visitors on each blog, sometimes it may vary. Overall, it's very good. Really enjoying their service.
got a cheap domain from these guys, never had a problem with them.

They dont care, whether you are an Dedicated or VPS Customer......Support is too bad.... Really incompetent Team... Wont ever recommend anyone to host an eCommerce site on Godaddy. Several evidence for bad and obnoxious support. E...Read More                                    
                                scalated the call to their CEO and MD even, but to vein. Useless and waste of time. Will very soon sue them. Had opted for FastComet and feeling much better even on Shared HostingLess
The only good for domain names.. hosting is not their core.
Pros: • good serviceCons: • none

reviews.review_title: OK for a non ecommerce travel site
reviews.review_text: Not a bad place if you want basic hosting. It is relatively reliable and the support is (eventually) there. Also it is an old player in the field and unlikely to close up shop any time soon.
Have been using GoDaddy for 10-12 years, have never had a problem.

GoDaddy offers alright service for non-crucial web applications. The prices are quite affordable, and the service includes many useful features. I had a problem with readability on two websites, first has been hacked trough a shar...Read More                                    
                                ed hosting, the second website has been down for over 24 hours. Support is quite normal, though, in the first case I managed solve the problem myself, and in the second case they were trying to be helpful, though I was speaking to customer support not the technical people who were actually working on the problem. GoDaddy has recently introduces a quite useful Worldpress hosting package, which works well. But they have been often twicking it, which was causing some delays and off times, though not quite often. In overall I recommend GoDaddy, although if reliability factor is crucial for your website you might want to look somewhere else.Less

I have been using Godaddy for several years. I have never had any problems costumer support has not been able to help me with. I have 5 websites being hosted by Godaddy and all of them are doing great. There maybe some less expens...Read More                                    
                                ive services out there, but not enough for me to switch everything over and trust a new service.Less

reviews.review_title: Flawed software and incompetent customer service
reviews.review_text:
Their software is very quirky. When you have an issue, they say to change browsers, yet IE and Firefox handle their software differently. Inconsistent html standards. Something that works in IE may not work in Firefox.

They als...Read More                                    
                                o allow porn and scam hucksters to go through their system, so outside ISPs and domains regularly block all communication generated from any and all GoDaddy users.....even from clean senders.

Their flawed software and terrible attention to customers' issues seriously compromise honest users' online reputations and identities.Less

I started using GoDaddy to host sites I authored in 2009. Not only have I not had any problems in the last 5 years, but they were extremely helpful when I was just starting. Their services on technical issues was excellent but the...Read More                                    
                                y also helped me get my business started. They guided me past the pitfalls and saved me both time and money.Less

We were with a company that was charging 5 times the price as Go Daddy. Since switching we have been very happy. Even when you have to be on hold for an extended period of time to speak with a customer service agent, you can ask f...Read More                                    
                                or a call back and actually get it when they say. This is remarkable. I highly recommend Go Daddy to all my friends.Less

I bought a Deluxe Linux Hosting. First, I picked up Asian server (not good with resources). Then when I had 7 websites for this plan, I contacted Support and switched to US Unlimited grid hosting. What a difference in speed and sy...Read More                                    
                                stem resources. Now with over 1,000 visitors a day of the whole seven website, there is almost no downtime and speed is really fatastic. Can't recommend enough the GRID hosting.Less

reviews.review_title: Small business website: 6 years, no issues.
reviews.review_text: GoDaddy.com had more options and priced better than our last host. Our small business has been using GoDaddy.com webhosting for over 6 years. No issues.I built and designed the site myself and did not use their web building tools. Works good with Dreamweaver.Would recommend.
